captions.text: The messages this season don't contradict previous seasons, they complete them
Guide us to the Straight Path
"Posions"
Any poisons your body intakes will lead to the damage of your body, which you will be held accountable for
One of the most ubiquitous types of poisons is tobacco smoke
There are 4,000 chemicals in each cigarette

Why do they add so many chemicals to cigarettes anyways?
Why aren't they made of tobacco only?
Tobacco alone is expensive. Plus chemicals are added to make cigarettes light quicker and increase the smoke produced to amp up the experience
What else contains some of the 4,000 chemicals that are found in cigarettes?
Paint, lead such as the type found in pencils, coals, candles,
pesticides, floor cleaners, dish-washing detergent, laundry detergent
Why am I wearing this hazard suit?
A lot of these chemicals are toxic
So much so that 60 of the chemicals found in cigarettes are banned by a number of countries across the world
Let's look at how the body's response to smoking differs from smokers and non-smokers
Alaa is a smoker and his body is used to cigarette smoke because he's been smoking for years
If AbdelRahman, on the other hand, were to smoke a cigarette for the first time.....
He's going to cough. Why?
His body, which is in a pristine state, is trying to reject the toxins from his body
Just like when an enemy tries to enter a castle, they are obstructed by the castle walls
The wall/defense is very strong the first time the toxins are introduced and will be expelled by coughing
If you continue to insist on smoking and keep introducing these toxins, the body will eventually stop defending itself
[Body] "I did what I could at first and protected you, but you aren't listening"
What does this do to our bodies?
This is a representation of lungs
This lung is going to be exposed to 20 packets of cigarettes
For people who smoke a pack a day, this amounts to 20 days of smoking
We're going to see the total impact after lighting these 20 packs
We're still on the 3rd cigarette, look at what happened to the lung
We can't even see through the glass anymore
Cigarette #100. The water's yellow. See how this is blackened
We're on the second motor
Cigarette #200. This is only 10 days worth of smoking
Notice how long it takes for the cigarette to smoulder
At the beginning of the experiment, the machine was in good shape and the cigarettes were 'inhaled' quickly
Now it's 3 times slower - with the second motor! That's like the replacing your lung when it's destroyed with a new one
Look at this disgusting water
We're going to boil it to see what it contains
This is essentially what you're putting into your lungs after only 15 days of smoking
So imagine what the lungs of long-term smokers looks like
If our organs could speak, they would protest, cry and scream at us
We're going to see what smoking does to our bodies at Kafa [Enough] to Prevent Smoking
These are the real lungs of a non-smoker
and the real lungs of a smoker
The dark color and staining of lungs is primarily caused by tar
This is the amount of tar accumulated in a person's lungs if they smoke 10 cigarettes a day for one year
And tar is used to make asphalt?
Yes it's the same tar - not similar- the same thing.
Notice the difference in breathing
We're not talking about just a difference in color or size
Look at the difference in movement between the two
Of course, non-smokers intake more oxygen while smokers can intake less
Non-smokers can also retain oxygen for longer periods of time compared to smokers
Australia is considered a pioneering country in combating smoking
Recently, in the past year, this is what they've done to cigarette packs
Many countries put repulsive pictures on cigarette packs but Australia's gone a step further
They've prevented cigarette manufacturers from branding the packs
I'm carrying three packs from three different companies but they all look the same
This pack is manufactured by the most famous cigarette company but you wouldn't be able to tell
It's just like any other pack
They're all dark and depressing,
Which country has the least smokers?
The United States of America has one of the lowest proportions of smokers
In the 1950s, in the USA,
if you were to watch TV,
you might stumble across an ad like this one,
It's ironic that the scene of this ad is a doctor's clinic
Who would've thought that this would be a normal scene in everyday American television?
Who would've imagined that doctors in the US actually promoted smoking?
That ignorance existed in the US but within 50-60 years it became one of the most anti-smoking countries- within its own territory
Cigarette companies don't make their money from the first world countries. They don't make profits from the United States
Most of the profits come from third world countries
Where unfortunately there is no culture to prevent smoking and focus on its negative impacts
Which now exists in the US
Just like the USA changed radically - from even doctors smoking- to the situation now
Gives hope that the Arab world can change and converge to the situation in the US, if not even better
They, and New Zealand, have a goal that by 2025-30 the country will be completely smoke-free
It's not just about banning smoking from restaurants and indoor areas
It's about completely getting rid of it
There are even ads today in New Zealand to raise awareness about this campaign
I was a smoker for 13 years. Alhamdulilah [Thank God] I quit in 2000
My advice to people who want to quit is to read the book 'Awaken the Giant Within'
The theme of the book is transforming oneself
After tawfiq [success] from God, this book is what enabled me to quit
My experience should give hope that anybody can quit smoking
Smoking severely damages the body.
The longer one smokes, the longer it takes the body to recover from the impacts of smoking
But on average: 20 minutes after you quit, your heart rate will return to the normal rate
After eight hours, the carbon monoxide levels drop to normal
After a week, your ability to smell and taste is restored
After 3 months, your lungs repair themselves and function properly again
After 10 years, it takes 10 whole years, your risk of dying from cancer will drop by half
Also, your risk of developing diabetes decreases and equalizes to the risk of a non-smoker
That's 10 years after quitting

So the sooner you quit the better 
Plus you give yourself and your body more time to recover
Where do these cigarettes that are smoked without any reflection come from?
There are tobacco farms filled with child laborers in several countries, especially Malawi
There's a reliance on child labor- tens of thousands of children work on these farms

They drop out of school and work 12 hours a day
They're also exposed to diseases on the farm
All of this just to produce a cigarette that people smoke, without contemplation,
And burn their bodies just like they've destroyed the future of the children who work on tobacco farms

Smoking also damages the environment
In Korea, for example, 40% of deforestation is caused by smoking
40% of deforestation in Uruguay is also caused by tobacco smoke
Deforestation is one of the major global environmental concerns, which has contributed to the global climate change crisis

So smoking bears some of the responsibility
So when you pick up a cigarette, think about all these impacts
This device basically calculates the age of your lungs
People are born with their lungs intact so the age of your lungs should equal your biological age
So Saleh, you're 28 years old, right? Your lungs should be 28 years old

Let's find out how old your lungs are
"Saleh has been smoking for many years"
According to this, Saleh's lungs are 51 years old
Lungs that are 51 years old cannot possibly meet a 28 year old body's needs for oxygen
We're going to see what a smoker's brain looks like
Mr. Ali used to be a smoker. He felt minor pains in this area [under chin], like an itch. He went to the doctor to have it checked out
Even before the test results came back, he wrote the doctor a check for two million riyals. The doctor was shocked and asked why he did that
Mr. Ali said that was for the doctor to tell him that he didn't have cancer
The doctor told him that he did in fact have throat cancer which he should have removed
He did the surgery and removed parts of the throat, thyroid and lymph nodes
He now uses a device to speak which amplifies the sound
He tells you to "have mercy on yourself before it's too late"
"You're still young! Chemotherapy and treatment are worse than the actual illnesses"
These are all his medications
He can't go to sleep without taking all these meds, he can't move without them
He says "if I could pay 10 million riyals to restore my health, I would - just to avoid the situation I'm in now. Alhamdulilah [Thank God]"
Abu Abdallah, it was great meeting you. I'm honored. Allah ykramek
I pray that all smokers use this month as a reason to get rid of this source of harm

comments.text:
نصيحة لوجه الله لأي شخص مايدخن ..
اذا جا يوم وكنت طالع مع احد واعطاك او قالك جرب او شي من هذا القبيل لاتجرب 
حتى لو كنت تقول من باب التجربة وانا واثق اني بتركه
لان كل المدخنين دخنوا من باب التجربة وانا منهم لكن للاسف هالتجربة تكون غلطت 
العمر والله تركه صعب جدا انا لي ٤ سنوات ادخن وكل فترة اقول بتركه ولا اقدر
والبعض يقول وش المتعة في الدخان .. هو طعمه سيء وريحته سيئة لكن المدخن 
مايقدر يتركه لأنه يتعب ويصدع راسه ويحس بتوتر ونرفزه اذا تركه وكل ماقعد 
ساعات 
اكثر كل مازاد توتره والصداع ولازم يدخن حتى يهدا وهنا المشكلة ..
نصيحة اخوية وتذكروا كلامي لا تاخذونه من باب التجربة او التسلية وتقولون انا 
صغير ولاحق اتركه .. واذا كنت في بداياتك في التدخين عندك فرصة انك تتركه قبل 
لاتصعب عليك﻿

comments.text: 煙草の健康被害。日本でも肺癌などの死亡率は今も高い。ただ最近は煙草の値上がりや特定の場所での喫煙など煙草の吸えるスペースというのが限られている。病院での煙草依存症の治療もあり年々煙草を吸う人も減少傾向にはある。煙草を吸う人から煙草を取り上げるのは中々難しい。日本での治療法は医療品の禁煙シールや電子煙草からのスタートかもね。あと45歳から5年毎の定期健診、無料の案内書が送られて来る。病気は未然に防ぎ国の負担を減らすと言うのが国の考え方なのだろう。また煙草を吸う人は携帯用の灰皿を持参している。どんな時でも街や道路は汚してはいけない。これはルールである。﻿
comments.author: BMYs

comments.text:
الح بالدعاء لربي ادع بيقين 
فلله كريم حيي يستحي من عبده اذا رفع يده ان لا يضع فيهما يخر < فيما معنى 
حديث للرسول 
اذا دعيت باستمرار بيقين ربي بيعطيك خيييير 
يا يستجيب لدعائك يا بيدفع ويرد عنك سوء عطيم كان بيصيبك او يصيب اخوانك 
ادع باستمرار فالدعاء عباده وخير عظيم ومافي مثل دعاء الانسان لنفسه 
راقرب لربك ترتاح نفسك وتلقى سعاده عظيمه ترحم كل من ابتعد عن ربه ودك يحسب 
بسعادتك حتى لو مليانه مشاكل بالدنيا بس بداخلك سعاااده
هذا حالي والله انا سعيده مره واذا صليييت ارتاااح مع اني موب مطوعه ولا 
مشتهره بس قربت من ربي بعد. ضياع وربي عظاني توفيق بحياتي ودخلني سعاده واذا 
كنت اصيح وسجدت ودعيت ربي او صليت اقوم مبسوووووطه

+ حافظ على صلاتك وتذكر من ترك شيء لله عوضه الله
واستغفر ليرزقكم باموال وبنين ووووو مثل ماجاء باية بالقرآن سبحانك ربي
وتذكر انك تقدر على اي شي واللي يحسسك بالعكز هو عقلك الباطن قل له الا انا 
اقدر وبسوي وبنجح ! مع المحاوله وتكرار كلامك هذا بيصدق عقلك الباطن وبيعاونك 
وماعاد تحس بعجز والله يوفقك ياخوي بالاسلام
comments.author: A7SAS09AD8
